long_description: The men's REI Woodside carcoat features a heritage look that's great for casual excursions, and a wealth of technical details, including ultralight, ultrathin insulation for warmth without bulkiness. PrimaLoft(R) Eco fill is lightweight, nonbulky and water resistant, yet very warm; fill is optimized for warmth, with more in the body, collar and upper sleeves. Polyester shell fabric is windproof up to 60 mph and has a Durable Water Repellent (DWR) finish. Wool-look reinforcement patches on shoulders and forearms are waterproof and abrasion resistant. The men's REI Woodside carcoat includes zip handwarmer pockets, additional front drop-in pockets and a zip inner chest pocket with a cord port. Jacket has an adjustable hood and hem drawcord; front zipper has a chin guard and a stormflap. Inner cuff gaskets seal in warmth.
short_description: The men's REI Woodside carcoat features a heritage look that's great for casual excursions, and a wealth of technical details, including ultralight, ultrathin insulation for warmth without bulkiness.
